short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple time tracker that automatically pauses itself when you're idle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minutes is a straightforward and user-friendly time tracking extension that simplifies the process of monitoring your work time. Download the extension, start a new session and continue work as normal. Once you end your session, review records of your active and idle time allowing you to reflect on your productivity.

Usage:
1. Install the extension.
2. To start tracking your time, activate the extension by clicking on the extension icon located in your browser toolbar and selecting "New Session". Alternatively, you can use the Command/Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut.
3. To end your session, click on the extension icon again and choose "End Session" or use the Command/Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut again.
